IrrKlang.NET

Vector3D.GetDistanceFrom Method 

Returns distance from an other point. Here, the vector is interpreted as point in 3 dimensional space.

Public Function GetDistanceFrom( _
   ByVal other As Vector3D _
) As Double
[C#]

   Vector3D other
);
